btw 0.0.0.9001
  • Reference

Tool: Describe installed packages

Source: R/tool-docs.R
btw_tool_get_installed_packages.Rd

Displays the name and title of all installed R packages in JSON format.

Usage

btw_tool_get_installed_packages()

Value

Returns a single string describing installed packages as JSON.

See also

btw_register_tools()

Other Tools: btw_register_tools(), btw_tool_describe_data_frame(), btw_tool_describe_environment(), btw_tool_list_files(), btw_tool_package_docs, btw_tool_read_text_file()

Examples

cat(btw_tool_get_installed_packages())
#> ```json [
